title: Responsive Design with Bootstrap
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Thinking in Breakpoints

### Mobile First
Start designing for `<576px`. elements stack. Then use `@include media-breakpoint-up(md) { ... }` to adjust for larger screens.

### RFS (Responsive Font Sizes)
Bootstrap can automatically rescale font sizes based on viewport.
`@include rfs(2rem, font-size);`

### Images
Use `<picture>` tag or `.d-none` / `.d-md-block` to serve different images capabilities for different devices.
summary: Advanced responsive design combines grid classes with custom media queries.
